steps.description: Coat -Coat a 6-oz. ramekin cup with cooking spray
steps.modified_description: Coat mark cup with cooking spray

steps.description: Pour-Pour 1 egg into the ramekin cup
Microwave-Microwave the ramekin cup uncovered on high for 30 seconds
steps.modified_description: Microwave-Microwave the ramekin cup uncovered on high for 20 seconds

steps.description: Top -Top cup with 1 tablespoon of salsa
steps.modified_description: Top cup with 2 tablespoon of salsa

steps.description: Cut -Cut the English muffin into two pieces with a knife
Line -Line the bottom piece of the English muffin with lettuce
Microwave -Continue to Microwave for 15-30 more seconds or until the egg is almost set
steps.modified_description: Microwave -Continue to Microwave for 10 more seconds

steps.description: sprinkle -sprinkle 1 tablespoon of cheese on cup
steps.modified_description: pour 1 tablespoon of cheese on cup

steps.description: Microwave -Microwave just until cheese melts, about 10 seconds
steps.modified_description: Microwave just until cheese and egg cooked melts, about 30 seconds

steps.description: Place -Place the egg from the cup over the lettuce
replace -replace the top of the English muffin
